title: Toxic community. Biased system.
body:
So basically, premade groups of players can just decide to report somebody for conduct that the player did not even do just out of their own spite. 

Using pings to communicate dragons, buffs and pushes. I did not type anything directly at my team. 

But just because they're 3 or 4 friends they decide to 4 stack + obviously tell the enemy team to report for Harassment and Negative attitude. When the chat log was full of them abusing me!

Next game what do you know? I get notified for not behaving according to League standards!!! Okay. What the hell. I did nothing wrong but now I'm accused of this??? 

The report system is terribly flawed in that players can bias an entire team to participate in reporting an innocent player. Which, that innocent player could be suspended for!!?!?! 

League has a completely unreasonable justice system that preys on the wrong people and lets the truly bad people get away with it.

replies.body:
A bunch of %%%%%%s decide to 4 man queue, a very good and green ribbon player is put on that %%%%%%ed team. All the 4 people feed while one good people try to make the right decisions. The 4 players start raging at the good player for not feeding and they report him for making all the good and sensible decisions. 

This happens once in every 20 games or so in normal game. OLD STORY BRAH, happens to everyone.

Well, it's just OCE, to be fair.

And I thought it was like, if you reported by a premade, it only counts as one vote. That's at least what I'd code it to be.
